name: I.D Club Membership Pack
description: ***SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS*** ***PLEASE READ*** Please specify T-Shirt Size in the 'Add special instructions to merchant' section when paying through Paypal. Also email idclub[at]thedraymin[dot]co[dot]uk with your photo for your I.D Card, it can be as mental looking as you like! And state your name and hometown in the subject bar when you email - e.g. Tony Blair, London - I.D Club joining info Completed orders will be shipped once per week on a Friday. WHAT DO YOU GET OUT OF IT??? A special individually boxed MEMBERS ONLY pack containing the following: The Draymin - I.D Club T-Shirt (Please specify size - S, M, L, XL) Signed Double Sided - The Draymin I.D Club poster. CD with 3 exclusive recordings. Individual I.D Club Photo I.D Card (which will gain you entry to exclusive I.D Club gigs and lots more). I.D Club Sticker. You will also become part of the I.D Club mailing list for exclusive free downloads and competitions, this will be for I.D Club members only. The first 50 people to join will be invited to appear in our first official video. WHAT DO WE GET OUT OF IT??? We don’t take a wage, every penny we receive through the I.D Club will go towards funding recordings, tours, new videos, new merchandise etc etc… The more people that join the better the I.D Club will become, we win and you win.
